item.title: Marcus Aurelius the man who solved the universe
item.description: I’ve been reading Marcus Aurielius’ Meditations and, very appropriately and scaringly, YouTube algorithm thought I would be interested in Marcus Aurelius, the Man Who Solved The Universe. The title is bombastic and misplaced, but it is well executed and correctly summarizes some of the Emperor-Philosopher’s thoughts.
item.content:encoded: I’ve been reading Marcus Aurielius’ Meditations and, very appropriately and scaringly, YouTube algorithm thought I would be interested in Marcus Aurelius, the Man Who Solved The Universe. The title is bombastic and misplaced, but it is well executed and correctly summarizes some of the Emperor-Philosopher’s thoughts.
